_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The actions of Gavesī and his followers: Gavesī thought of fulfilling the precepts
Gavesī and his followers fulfilled the precepts
Gavesī and his followers became celibate
Gavesī thought of eating in one part of the day
Gavesī and his followers ate in one part of the day
Gavesī received the going forth and ordination in the Buddha’s presence
Gavesī realized the supreme culmination of the spiritual path in this very life
Gavesī became one of the perfected
The five hundred lay followers received the going forth and ordination in the Buddha’s presence
The five hundred mendicants, headed by Gavesī, realized the supreme bliss of freedom
